titlepage.titleproper: Register of the Chilean Subject Collection, 1933-1999
titlepage.publisher:
Hoover Institution Archives
Stanford University
Stanford, California

defitem.label: Processed by:
defitem.item: Rebecca J. Mead and David Jacobs

titlepage.p: © 1998 Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Chilean Subject Collection,

physdesc.label: Extent
physdesc.extent: 11 manuscript boxes, 2 oversize boxes, 1 phonorecord, 110 slides, 2 phonotape cassettes

did.abstract: Reports, pamphlets, correspondence, bulletins, press releases, minutes, resolutions, campaign material, and printed matter, relating to the presidency of Salvador Allende and the military coup of 1973 in Chile; subsequent political, economic and human rights conditions in Chile; the Chilean plebiscite of 1988 and elections of 1989 and 1992; and communist political movements in Chile.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Chilean Subject Collection, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog Socrates at http://library.stanford.edu/webcat. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in Socrates is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

did.unittitle: Subject File, 1933-1999

scopecontent.p: Reports, pamphlets, correspondence, position papers, bulletins, press releases, charts, serial issues, newsletters, flyers, campaign material, circulars, speeches, opinion polls, biographical sketches, clippings, minutes, resolutions, charts, and miscellany. Arranged alphabetically by subject

did.unittitle: Oversize File, 1972-1989

scopecontent.p: Clippings, serial issues, handbills, and miscellaneous election material

did.unittitle: Audiovisual File, n.d. and 1970

scopecontent.p: One phonorecord relating to the massacre of striking nitrate miners in 1907; 110 slides used in a literacy campaign

did.unittitle: SUBJECT FILE, 1933-1993
General. Reports, pamphlets, serial issues, bulletins, circular, and clippings, 1969-1992. SEE ALSO: AUDIOVISUAL FILE
General
Allende administration. Letter, pamphlets, reports, newsletters, correspondence, charts, and flyers; includes material relating to agricultural development, 1972-1973
Armed Forces. Reprints, 1988
Direccion de Inteligencia Nacional (DINA). Serial issue giving details of secret archives of the Chilean intelligence service, 1993. Includes information on the assassination of General Carlos Prats
Drugs. Speech by Javier Illanes, 1988(?).
Economics. Reports and newsletters, 1979-1993. Includes statistical data and macroeconomic analyses
Human rights
General. Clippings, speech, leaflet, pamphlet, report, instructional material, 1977-1990
United Nations Commission on Human Rights. Correspondence and reports, 1970-1971

Leftist organizations. Program statements, pamphlets, bulletins, and serial issues, 1943-1987. Includes press releases and bulletins issued by Russia, China, and the National Liberation Front (Vietnam)
Movimiento de Izquierda Revolucionaria (MIR). Speeches, program statements, flyers, serial issues, and newsletters, 1969-1975
Movimiento de Izquierda Revolucionaria
Partido Comunista de Chile. Reports, pamphlets, flyers, circulars, and newsletters, 1976-1987
Partido Comunista de Chile
Partido Socialista de Chile. Program statements, flyers, serial issues, pamphlets, and newsletters, 1981-1988
Politics
General. Statutes, pamphlets, program statements, and serial issues, 1933-1989. Includes material relating to fascist organizations in Chile
Plebiscite, 1988. Reports and newsletter, 1988
Elections
General. Pamphlets, statutes, serial issues, electoral guide, opinion polls, clippings, program statements, newsletter, and miscellany, 1989
General
Concertacion por la Democracia. Program statements, clippings, and miscellany, primarily relating to the presidential candidacy of Patricio Aylwin Azocar, 1989
Conservative parties. Program statements, clippings, biographical sketches, and miscellany, primarily relating to the candidacies of Hernan Buchi Buc and Francisco Errazuriz Talavera, 1989
1992. Flyers, leaflets, and miscellany, 1992

Youth organizations (primarily leftist). Reports, position papers, clippings, correspondence (including communist youth organizations in other countries), meeting materials, flyers, resolutions, pamphlets, newsletters, poems, and miscellany; includes material relating to the Juventudes Comunistas de Chile, Juventud Democrata Cristiana, Movimiento de Izquierda Revolucionaria, and Pablo Neruda, 1968-1973
OVERSIZE FILE, 1972-1989.
Clippings, serial issues, handbills, and miscellaneous election material
AUDIOVISUAL FILE, n.d. and 1970.
One phonorecord, "The Siege of Santa Maria de Iquique: A People's Cantata of the Chilean Nitrate Miners," performed by Quilapayun, 1970
110 slides used in a literacy campaign
